page.title: 07Farming in Langho area
page.content: Farming in this area is mixed , dominated mostly by dairy farms which are owner occupied or tenanted from large estates or private landlords and range in size from belown 50 acres to well over 100 acres . The majority of milk produced is sold wholesale and collected by the Milk Marketing Board tankers daily , although several farmers in our area have milk rounds selling and delivering farm bottled milk daily to the door . The land is mainly clay with a top covering of soil , producing hay and silage for the cattle and sheep in Winter and grazing in Summer . A combination of cereal , vitamins , minerals and protein is given to cattle and also to sheep before lambing . Farmers use their own machines but seasonal work may be done by contractor .
